Operational Success Begins with a Service Blueprint
Google's New Earbuds Instantly Translate 40 Languages

Wired PR works to connect you and your message with the people who matter most to your business. As a full-service public relations agency, our number one goal is producing results that benefit you and your business. We work with you to create innovative, strategic communications that tell your story, motivate your audience and cultivate leadership.
Specialized in creative and news writing, editing, media relations, research, and strategic planning.

In my short time at the Republic I was a general assignment reporter for the West Valley and Southwest Valley, then covered the city of Tolleson and Litchfield Park (not a whole lot to cover there, unless you like debates about cell phone towers diguised as palm trees!).

At The State Press I covered the business beat...the best beat at the paper (in my opinion)! I learned a lot about start-up companies, business and marketing tactics and interviewed some interesting entrepreneurs.

June 13, 2012, Jennifer worked with Beth but at different companies

Beth is a delight to work with. When I asked her to work on a client's project she did a fantastic job, demonstrating professionalism, a high degree of business acumen, and expertise in public relations. This particular client had a challenging brand, but Beth very quickly gained an understanding of the client's needs and got us results in the form of several local network appearances and published articles. Despite the challenging brand and unique terminology, Beth was able to create several articles on behalf of the client that clearly spoke to the audience without losing the client's personality in the process. Those articles lead to new business and the client was very pleased.She was able to turn work around on tight deadlines and happily navigated through sensitive conversations, setting expectations and assisting us in making appropriate PR plans and decisions with ease.I highly recommend Beth without reservation for your PR consulting needs and look forward to working with her again soon.

Chris Ronzio
Founder & CEO, Organize Chaos | Serial Entrepreneur | Author | Speaker
October 4, 2016, Beth was a client of Chris’

I recently had the opportunity to work with Chris...and...all I can say is, wow! Admittedly, I drug my feet for bit before deciding to move forward with working with Chris. Had I known how much an impact he would have on my business and even my mindset, I would've done it sooner. Every meeting was extremely productive. We actually took care of things right then and there rather than me leaving with a laundry list of things to do. He helped remove a number roadblocks on our path to growth. Chris is extremely efficient, with an uncanny ability to quickly get to the root of the problem. On top of it all, he's deeply empathetic and understands the unique struggles entrepreneurs go through – personally and professionally – because he is one.  I highly recommend working with Chris.

summary: Beth Cochran is the co-founder/CEO of Wired PR, a strategic communications firm based in Phoenix. She specializes in helping organizations identify and interpret their unique stories to engage their consumers and convert them into passionate advocates. She is also the founder of SuccessLabFor more than nine years, Beth has been developing effective communications programs that enable organizations to grow their market share, expand their brand recognition and fortify their reputation.Beth has worked with a variety of clients, including Rhonda Allison Clinical Enterprises, Tallwave, Pragmatic Marketing, Posh Restaurant,Villa La Paws Pet Resort & Spa, Heckler Design, and Urban Oven.Prior to forming Wired PR, Beth wrote for the Arizona Republic and reported for a transit news show in New York City. She currently serves on the Singleton Moms Advisory Board, and previously served as the digital communications chair on the Board of Directors for the Public Relations Society of America (PRSA) Phoenix chapter, and on the Phoenix Animal Care Coalition (PACC911) Board of Directors. She graduated magna cum laude from Arizona State University’s Cronkite School with a bachelor’s degree in Journalism and Mass Communication.Beth has received a Bronx Excellence in Television Access Award for Educational Programming, a Certificate of Special Merit in sports writing from The Association of Journalism and Mass Communication and The William Randolph Hearst Foundation, as well as The Society of Professional Journalists Mark of Excellence Award for Online In-Depth Reporting.
name: Beth Cochran
title: Co-Founder & CEO of Wired PR - specializing in content marketing and PR for tech companies
